message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $9,500. I believe this reflects its worth and offers you a fair deal.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, $8,200 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?  This recognizes its worth while still offering you a good deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I still need to make sure it fits within my budget.
